programme.title: Northern Lights: A Journey to Love
programme.desc: The life of a Filipino immigrant (Piolo Pascual) changes drastically when he reunites with his estranged son (Raikko Mateo) in Alaska.

programme.title: Matimbang pa sa Dugo

programme.desc: It was love at first site for Jonathan and Kate but fate kept them apart for years. Now both, on the verge of marriage, decide to reverse fate.

programme.desc: A series of spectacular evil crimes has risen and former super-villain Gru has been recruited to find out who is responsible for them.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Kate Cooper, Tyler Owens and their competing teams find themselves right in the path of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma and will be in the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one word—Tenet—and fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: It was love at first site for Jonathan and Kate but fate kept them apart for years. Now both, on the verge of marriage, decide to reverse fate.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: A series of spectacular evil crimes has risen and former super-villain Gru has been recruited to find out who is responsible for them.

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Michael Jordan and Bugs Bunny team up in an outer space basketball match to save kidnapped Looney Tunes characters.

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: After workers at a luxury condominium discover that a billionaire stole their retirement money, they plot a heist to reclaim what he took from them... and more.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs
programme.desc: An ex-homicide detective with memory loss is forced to solve a brutal murder he can't recall.

programme.title: No Strings Attached
programme.desc: A guy and a girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they both want something more.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: An underground fight club worker seeks vengeance against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and continue to prey on the powerless.

programme.title: London Calling
programme.desc: A down on his luck hitman is forced to babysit the teenage son of his new crime boss after fleeing the UK from a job gone wrong.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one word—Tenet—and fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Kate Cooper, Tyler Owens and their competing teams find themselves right in the path of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma and will be in the fight of their lives.

programme.title: SORI: VOICE FROM THE HEART
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: TOSS COIN
programme.desc: A busker met a girl who makes decision through tossing a coin.

programme.title: I, THE EXECUTIONER
programme.desc: Detective Seo Do-cheol and rookie Park Sun-woo join forces to investigate a professor's murder linked to past cases. As they pursue a suspected serial killer, the culprit releases teasers online, escalating public panic. The Major Crimes team races against time to stop the killer's next strike.

programme.title: THE SNITCH
programme.desc: Kang-soo was falsely accused and imprisoned. A prosecutor offered him a deal to be a snitch in exchange for a reduced sentence and Kang-soo starts to shake up the drug investigation...

programme.title: ONCE AGAIN
programme.desc: Woo-seok in his 40's has always dreamt of going back to his high school days when he had the best days of his life. After an accident, he wakes up and finds himself in the year 1997...

programme.title: THE FATAL ENCOUNTER

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Soar over vast deserts, enormous diamonds, and the world's largest inland oasis.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Rediscover the Tet Offensive: two months of battles that killed more than 15,000 American and Allied troops, and triggered anti-war protests across the U.S. Explore reports, images, and combat footage, much of which hasn’t been seen since 1968.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Building The Impossible
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Building The Impossible
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Building The Impossible
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Dogs get trained to be sniffer dogs, protection dogs and search and rescue dogs in Austria. In the USA, dogs help to locate people trapped on the mountain and dogs who help guard the farms from wolves and coyotes.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: We find out what goes on in the training of a 'general purpose dog' and how a English Springer Spaniel has the ability to sniff out one billionth of a gram of an explosive substance.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: In Malaysia, dogs are used to sniff out illegal DVDs while in UK, dogs are trained to search a fire scene and identify flammable liquids.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves

programme.title: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever!
programme.desc: A brain freeze inspires Melvin to make up for all of his wrongs! Lotta does everything she can to win over a little kitten.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesn’t want the others to hear what’s in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement can’t happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think they're a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves. / When Marcus and Harper team-up for a school project, they decide to bake something ("It's like inventing, but with food!"), only to come across multiple baking misshaps (and happy accidents) along the way that the Dew Drops must secretly assist them with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at “Hide & Seek” so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now she’s going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.desc: In Back to the Future Part III, Marty travels to 1885 to save Doc from an outlaw. Packed with laughs, action, and heart, it’s the epic Wild West finale to the beloved trilogy.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as tough detective John Kimble in Kindergarten Cop, going undercover as a teacher to find a drug lord's wife. Packed with action, humor, and heart, it’s a classic comedy-thriller.

programme.title: 10.5 Apocalypse Part 1
programme.desc: A massive earthquake creates a chain of events that threaten two of the largest nuclear reactors.

programme.title: 10.5 Apocalypse Part 2
programme.desc: A massive earthquake creates a chain of events that threaten two of the largest nuclear reactors.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In Battleship, Earth battles a powerful alien force across sea, sky, and land. Directed by Peter Berg and starring Liam Neeson, Taylor Kitsch, and Rihanna, it's explosive action at sea.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in 47 Ronin, an epic fantasy where an outcast joins samurai on a quest for vengeance and honor against a ruthless overlord in ancient Japan.

programme.title: Godzilla Minus One
programme.desc: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Japan 1
programme.desc: Joanna catches a bullet train straight into the metropolitan sprawl of Tokyo, before heading to the ancient capital of Kyoto with its stunning temples and shrines.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure 1

programme.title: Frozen Planet II 2

programme.title: Solar System 1

programme.title: Engineering Reborn 1
programme.desc: First constructed in the 1930s, the West Side Line - an elevated viaduct section of the New York Central Railroad - was abandoned in the 1980s. But since 2009 it's been totally revitalised.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed 1

programme.desc: Doc is determined to keep the team together, which is falling apart. Meanwhile, an unknown virus tests the ward.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2
programme.desc: Some time later, when the pandemic is over, everyone's lives are turned upside down. While Doc seems willing to leave everything, a new internist, a new infectious specialist, but above all a new primary arrives at the hospital.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2
programme.desc: Andrea faces a difficult choice in the hopes to practice again, but if he fails he can never be a doctor again.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2
programme.desc: A return to the months of the first wave, to finally discover the secret that Doc and his people are hiding.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.desc: Andrea goes back to wearing the lab coat for a day, but a sudden IT blackout of the hospital systems forces him to make a series of risky choices.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S2

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women’s Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei’s father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Bill's swinging-arm growth prevents him from living his retirement dreams. Regina distracts from the many moles on her face with a vibrant sense of style.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a family-friendly, go-to meal of sautéed chicken thighs marinated with chilli crisp, cooked with mango salsa and served with steamed vegetables.

programme.title: Dying For A Crown
programme.desc: Lydia and her daughter Elle have just relocated to Florida. Lydia is the new Assistant Principal at Bellview High. As prom season begins, Elle stops at nothing to become homecoming queen.

programme.title: Murdaugh Murders: The Movie - Part 2
programme.desc: This twisted saga, one that has entranced and disturbed the public for years, continues to captivate with its true tale of privilege, madness, and murder.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The auditions conclude with chefs from the South. Each contestant has 45 minutes to prepare a signature dish that will impress the judges and secure the five remaining spots in the top 20.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Inspired by international film star and cookbook author Sophia Loren's recipe for eggplant parmigiana, Rachael makes the dish in the proper Italian style, with aged Parmigiano Reggiano cheese.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: A trip to Australia with the closest friends: there's a large paddleboard that five people can ride together. After a fun time on the paddleboard, Genius Jang comes up with a game idea, as usual...

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants known for serving up old world comfort food classics: Veselka in New York City and Canter's in Los Angeles. Buddy learns Veselka's time-honoured technique of making pierogies.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants that thrive on recipes handed down through generations. First, he heads to Mamoun's Falafel, then off to Nashville to visit Silver Sands Cafe.

programme.title: Yuri's Winning Recipe (S2)
programme.desc: Yuri has been passionately posting home-cooked food on her Instagram account. Is there any better way to fall in love with cooking than experimenting with new recipes and sharing them with viewers?

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Host Matt Richards goes to the French Quarter in New Orleans, Louisiana to find the best brunch, wild card, and po boy dishes.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Deep Ellum in Dallas, TX is the live music capital of North Texas, but it's also known for having the best late night munchies and brunches around to keep the foodies energised and coming back for more.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to go back in time for a dining experience from a bygone era? In this episode, host Michael Yo transports viewers to a 1920s-style New York City speakeasy.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Dining without wi-fi facilities might be too much for some people, but anyone wanting to unleash their wild side should join host Michael Yo for a journey to some far-out eating places.

programme.title: Rock The Block (S6)

programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: In what appears to be a serendipitous encounter upon saving the life of a stranger, the calculated and reserved businessman Nick (Aga Muhlach) meets the impulsive and optimistic photographer Ali (Bea Alonzo), who believes in destiny and carpe diem.

programme.title: Sundo
programme.desc: Romano sees ghosts. But he sees ghost only around people who will soon encounter sudden, tragic deaths. Romano, Louella, and Isabel now face the biggest fight of their lives.

programme.title: MIA
programme.desc: Mia Salazar (Coleen Garcia), a self-destructive, alcoholic doctor who joined the Doctor to the Barrios program to heal from the tragedy of her fiance's death meets the cheerful and nerdy forester Jay Policarpio (Edgar Allan Guzman). Together, the two will embark on a new journey.

programme.title: War Freak
programme.desc: Jack Llamas (Cesar Montano) is a dedicated half-Chinese cop being forced to marry a woman he does not love. Liza's (Jack's girlfriend) death pushes Jack to the edge, making him extremely irritable and sometimes violent. Jack has become every inch a warfreak.

programme.title: Fangirl Fanboy
programme.desc: It tells the story of a wannabe actor and a talented teleserye dubber who agrees to help him improve his acting. Her coaching helps him achieve his dream of becoming a star only to find herself heartbroken when he becomes successful.

programme.title: Sanggano, Sanggago't Sanggwapo
programme.desc: Three troublesome friends learns that one of them is actually rich when his father passes away and leaves him a hacienda.

programme.title: Booba
programme.desc: Rufa Mae stars in this comedy as Booba as she endeavors in the metropolis to fulfill her promise to her dying mother that she will find her jealous and insecure sister who run away from home.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally killed in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned for inquest. Each has a version to tell.

programme.title: Ang Pahina
programme.desc: Because of Mira’s (Kiray Celis) determination to convinced her loved one study, she, together with her mother Linda, Mang Johnny and Paul all have graduated with flying colors with the help of DepEd’s Alternative Learning System.

programme.title: Ira
programme.desc: Ira

programme.title: Darkroom
programme.desc: A group of teenage friends who seeks the thrill of ghost-hunting, and stumbles upon an old camera. As they carelessly play with it, they unknowingly summon the demon that exists inside.

programme.title: Kaluskos
programme.desc: Amid the custody battle, Rebekah (Coleen Garcia) finds another "Amaya" under the bed. Wanting to start a new life with the other Amaya, Rebekah seeks to set her free. But to do that, she needs to kill the impostor.

programme.title: Basta Ikaw... Nanginginig Pa
programme.desc: Enteng (Vic Sotto) has long been looking for the right girl, it seems that he doesn’t have much luck at it. Disappointed, he decides to join his cousin in Manila where he meets Selya (Rosanna Roces), his cousin’s landlady.

programme.title: Where Are You, Christmas?
programme.desc: Addy wishes for a year without Christmas and she wakes up in a world of black and white. She must work together with the town mechanic to restore Christmas.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E13 - The Amnesiac
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations E08 - World War I (Part 4)
programme.desc: The dramatization of Alex Haley's family line from post Civil War America to the writer's search for his roots.

programme.title: Married With Children S5 E19 - Kids! Wadaya Gonna Do?
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married… With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: Bewitched S5 E25 - Samantha's Power Failure
programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S12 E20 - Totem
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: CSI S5 E14 - Unbearable
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The Nanny S1 E21 - Frannie's Choice
programme.desc: Fran Fine turns up on the doorstep of Maxwell Sheffield and finds herself the nanny of Maxwell's three children: Maggie, Brighton, and Grace. Maxwell Sheffield is unhappy about it at first, but Fran turns out to be just what he and his family needed.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire following their grandmother's passing.

programme.desc: Raul Portugis is a Physics professor from Cebu who had relocated to Manila and became a witness to a crime. This, plus the experience of handling a difficult class and being a newcomer in the big city, results in one of Redford White's funniest films.

programme.title: Kailan Sasabihing Mahal Kita? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is all about a marriage,which started on the wrong foot. Compromised by her boyfriend, Sharon agreed to marry family friend, Christopher, in order to save face.

programme.title: Smith & Wesson
programme.desc: Comedians Vic & Joey play ace detectives Jessie Smith and James Wesson. As part of the famed "Mayumi Vice Squad" under Mayor Mayumi, the dynamic duo match wits against the equally notorious Tio Pablo.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Tinik Sa Dibdib (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a searing drama about a young woman who got married to escape from her family of parasites only to find herself in a worse situation.

programme.title: Unang Tibok
programme.desc: Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotectiveness. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.

programme.title: Hepe Goes To War
programme.desc: Hepe Goes To War

programme.title: Nang Iniwan Mo Ako
programme.desc: What should a woman do when, one day, the husband whom she built her world around with comes home, unexpectedly, and tells her that he’s leaving her for another?

programme.title: Magtago Ka Na Sa Pinanggalingan Mo
programme.desc: Magtago Ka Na Sa Pinanggalingan Mo

programme.title: Ninja Kids
programme.desc: The bagets kids were off on a thrilling adventure ride with lots of laughs when a mysterious old man gave them medallions endowed with supernatural powers. Through these medallions, they could retrieve an old ninja sword from the clutches of an evil woman.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In Mexico City, a former Marine swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Elektra unwittingly takes part in her former teacher's test when she protects a former target and his daughter from "The Hand," a sinister crime syndicate of martial arts fighters.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: Millionaire Thornton Melon’s (Rodney Dangerfield) son is a college misfit, so Thornton lends some fatherly support...by enrolling as a fellow freshman! Who cares if he never finished high school? Thornton’s pockets are deep enough to buy his way in! But when he steals his professor’s girlfriend (Sally Kellerman), Thornton goes just a little too far. Now, he’ll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account – or go back to being the world’s wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Man on Fire

programme.title: The Deer Hunter
programme.desc: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

programme.title: The Secret Of NIMH
programme.desc: A widowed mouse lives with her children on a farm. When her son falls ill, she sets out to seek the aid of a colony of super-intelligent rats, with whom she has a deeper link.

programme.desc: Apollo 13 is an inspiring and riveting story of the real-life space flight that gripped a nation and changed the world.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Lonely Ah Zhen is bullied by his coworkers. When he spends his birthday with Yumi, his friends shockingly discover that Yumi is an inflatable doll. Seeking companionship, Ah Zhen turns to the internet and finds his ideal girl Mina. Her arrival transforms his life but a series of unexpected events unfold as her identity as a vampire is revealed.

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: When a young woman's body is pulled from the ocean off the Big Island, accusations threaten to destroy the local community. As tensions grow, a surprising discovery leads detectives to a devastating truth.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Matheau Moore sits down for a polygraph test with former FBI agent George Olivo. Though he was found not guilty of murdering his wife, suspicions still follow him—even among those closest to the case.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: After a man and a woman are found shot, investigators struggle to find clues to catch the killer until a deputy locates the victim's car filled with guns, silencers, and a mysterious man behind the wheel.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Nacole Smith is brutally murdered in 1995 on a wooded path in Atlanta, the police and community rally around her mother as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: In Modesto, a woman is brought in for her 14th felony charge, while a young man is arrested after not having reflectors on his bicycle. A man dances his way to the drunk tank.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Chef Philip Rolph was besotted with waitress Georgina Henshaw. But Phil realised she was using him for his money, and Georgina bragged to a friend that she was planning to kill him.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: The Sheriff's Office in DeRidder, Louisiana, receives a distressing phone call from the owner of Dee's Motel. The man tells them that he's found a woman dead in room 6.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: In 1991 Curtis "Cochise" Smith, 29, heads out for diapers in Plaquemine, Louisiana, and vanishes. Twenty-five years later, a body surfaces in the bayou, and Cochise's murder case reignites.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 73-year-old murder suspect trashes the interrogation room; a married mother of three admits to a 26-year-old cold case killing; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Investigators interrogate a prison inmate about an unsolved serial killer case from the 90s; a former police sergeant is questioned about the murder of his mistress; and more.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Nanny Yoselyn Ortega had been looking after Kevin and Marina's three children. One day, plagued by psychotic thoughts and hearing voices, she snapped, with devastating consequences for two tiny lives.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Ashlea and Emmett find they share the Mormon faith and within months are engaged. But seven years into their marriage, three cops come knocking on the couple's door.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Skiing icon Dean Cummings is on trial for the shooting death of Guillermo Arriola, a local New Mexican rancher who was only armed with a can of mace.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Nia Wilson and her two sisters decided to take public transportation back home. But just minutes after texting their father, the sisters were brutally targeted at a train station.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: African-American women in the Mt Pleasant neighbourhood of Cleveland were vanishing. Their families cried for help, but no one knew what was happening. No one except Anthony Sowell.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: L'Abri, the new shelter run by the Monaco SPA, opens its doors in Peille. Karine Manglou takes us behind the scenes as the staff look after the animals, while Océane Barascut looks at the animals' adoption journeys, including encounters and touching stories.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Comment Ça Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: Simultaneously linked to Yukon's history and essential to its economy, how is the mining industry being affected by climate warming, and above all, what is it doing to be part of the solution?

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: L'Épicerie
programme.desc: The place to be for all those who are interested in what they put on their plates and all things relating to food. The programme: reports, surveys, taste tests, test benches, answers to questions from television viewers, including advice and simple but effective tricks.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 100 % Pur Poils
programme.desc: L'Abri, the new shelter run by the Monaco SPA, opens its doors in Peille. Karine Manglou takes us behind the scenes as the staff look after the animals, while Océane Barascut looks at the animals' adoption journeys, including encounters and touching stories.

programme.title: Paname
programme.desc: Yvan Hallouin walks around Paris and its surroundings. In each stroll, the soul and identity of the 'City of Light' are examined through encounters with the local inhabitants and historical anecdotes.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Pétole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Raconte À Wanda Jemly
programme.desc: Children tell a story, a traditional tale or an anecdote to the Cameroonian author and storyteller Wanda Jemly. Smiles and emotion guaranteed!

programme.title: Raconte À Wanda Jemly
programme.desc: Children tell a story, a traditional tale or an anecdote to the Cameroonian author and storyteller Wanda Jemly. Smiles and emotion guaranteed!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Prodiges 2025
programme.desc: The must-see event of the holiday season, with beautiful moments of emotion in a setting adorned with Christmas colors! This year again, twenty-four young talents, aged 6 to 16, will perform during two semi-finals, accompanied by the Divertimento orchestra, conducted by Zahia Ziouani.

programme.title: Don'T Put Me In A Box
programme.desc: World-renowned Dutch-speaking Belgian choreographer Sidi Larbi Cherkaoui covers all styles of dance. He draws inspiration from his origins and his deep-rooted commitments, and resists being put in a box. ''I'm Arab, white, gay and vegan, whatever I do is political'', he explains. Portrait.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Brittany, visit the Pont-Aven museum. Interior design and a passion for cinema come together in Sandra Benhamou's world. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In this fitness variety show, Patrick learns how to exercise. // A family of dummies move into the Star home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star family's pet toilet Tinkle has eleven toilet puppies.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Blossom, Hefty and Smurfette take Scaredy into the forest to overcome his fears. // The whole village admires Painter's new style of painting, without realizing that the artist is actually Baby Smurf.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lily and Farmer have to save the village from a slobbering monster! // Rowena is turned into Smurfette and takes her place in the village, whilst the real Smurfette becomes Gargamel's mother's new doll.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack & Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jack's mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Wylde Pak

programme.title: The Beautiful Spark
programme.desc: After losing his job in a scandal, Michelin-starred chef Philippe gets a second chance at La Belle Étincelle - a unique restaurant run by Virginie, and staffed by her autistic son Noé alongside other young people with disabilities.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Naked King
programme.desc: Captain Kandinsky follows the trail of a mysterious notebook linking unsolved crimes. Guided by Commissioner Macena’s clues, Kandinsky begins the hunt for the predator behind all the murders.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: The Traveller: At the End of the Night
programme.desc: Laurent, the brother of Captain Kandinsky, gets into an argument with a young woman who accuses him of harassment. All suspicion inevitably falls on Laurent when she is discovered dead the next day, and it is up to Kandinsky to clear his brother’s name.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: The Beautiful Spark

programme.title: The Traveller: At the End of the Night
programme.desc: Laurent, the brother of Captain Kandinsky, gets into an argument with a young woman who accuses him of harassment. All suspicion inevitably falls on Laurent when she is discovered dead the next day, and it is up to Kandinsky to clear his brother’s name.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelo’s mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mother’s last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: From The Vine
programme.desc: A burnt-out executive experiences an ethical crisis and travels back to his hometown in rural Italy to recalibrate his moral compass.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: Lilly's Disappearance (2)
programme.desc: Lilly has now been missing for days without a trace. A journalist convinces Anna and Robert that the media could help. Meanwhile, the police unexpectedly focus the investigation on Lilly’s own parents. And the evidence against them is mounting.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Lake Como, Italy. A cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve. What happened that night? How will this accident change the destiny of the rich Bernaschi family and the Rovelli family on the edge of bankruptcy?

programme.title: The Boy Who Wants To Live
programme.desc: 70-year-old Willi catches Malian refugee Nama stealing, but decides not to report him. Having been a refugee once, Willi sees a part of himself in Nama, and brings him home. However, Nama’s decision further frays his relationship with his son.

programme.title: The Cave Of The Yellow Dog
programme.desc: Nansal, a Mongolian nomadic girl finds a puppy and brings it home but her father believes it to be bad luck. But when the dog saves the family’s baby, he finally accepts it. Central to this tale is the belief in the cycle of rebirth between man and dog.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.
